about_the_game:
This Spirit Petal Pack includes 20 fae-themed Clothing Items, 4 Fae-themed Wigs, 1 Spirit Petal Pet, 1 Spirit Koi Mount, and 9 different Furniture Items.

Across the Eastward Sea is an ancient land teeming with primordial elemental energy. Fae spirits dance and glide through the mana-rich forests, invisible to all but the watchers. In the Spirit Petal Pack, you will receive a spiritual bounty of fae goodies to bring fae magic to your farm.

Pack includes:

  • Fae Furniture Set including: a Table, a Rug, a Bed, a Wardrobe, a Couch, Chairs, End Tables, Lamps, and an Orb Decoration.
  • Fae Koi Mount
  • Ixi, the Fae Spirit Pet
  • 8 Fae Outfit Sets including: 8 Hats, 4 Wigs, 4 Shirts, 4 Dresses, 2 Pants, 2 Skirt, and 1 Gloves
